name: Seaside (yeoji)
description:
Your friend has asked you to go on a day trip to the seaside.

You've agreed then, but the day is here now, and you're really not that excited anymore.

Maybe it could be good for you.

Maybe she sees that too.

After all, you've gotta start learning how to enjoy the little things in life again.

Made for Mini Jam 108: Seaside
